name: constcncfg
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, c2)), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c0, cc), wss(c2, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wss(c0, cc), wss(c2, cc)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wss(c0, cc), wss(c2, cc)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wss(c0, cc), wss(c2, cc)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c0, ccncf, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: A constant function is a continuous function on ` CC ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
